# 月报写作参考指南

## 格式规范

```
[Action Verb] + [Product/Feature Name] + [Version/Scope] + with [Technical Details], 
[enabling/achieving/ensuring] + [Business Outcome] + [Metrics if available].
```

## 参考案例

### 产品发布
```
Shipped Hera Automation Desk v1.3.0 with production-grade Azure Monitor + OpenTelemetry integration, enabling end-to-end observability (telemetry tracking, command execution monitoring, and performance metrics) to drive data-informed workflow optimization and real-time performance visibility.
```

### 指标达成
```
Achieved 99.03% Cosmic deployment compliance evidence collection and 100% deployment-to-build linkage by optimizing Mobr–Conductor pipeline integration and introducing a gap-filling data collection tool, ensuring full traceability and driving Mobr adoption beyond 90% as the unified platform for scalable, reliable deployment management.
```

### 技术迁移
```
Migrated evidence collection from CredScan to 1ES Secret Scanning (SPMI), ensuring 99.01% compliance coverage for credential scanning and published reports in ARMOR - SPMI Evidence for continuous monitoring.
```

### 功能发布
```
Released version 1.10 of Hera Automation Desk with Azure DevOps integration and AI-powered deployment extraction.
```

### 推进跟进
```
Followed up on HeraAdoExtension OIDC support rollout to remove dependency on Hera service connections in official 1es build pipelines, reducing sensitive connection risks.
```

## 推荐动词

| 场景 | 动词 | 使用场景 |
|------|------|---------|
| 产品发布 | Shipped, Released, Launched, Delivered | 产品/功能正式上线 |
| 指标达成 | Achieved, Attained, Reached | 达到某个指标/目标 |
| 技术实现 | Implemented, Developed, Built, Created | 功能开发/新工具 |
| 系统迁移 | Migrated, Upgraded, Transitioned | 系统/数据迁移 |
| 流程优化 | Optimized, Enhanced, Improved, Streamlined | 性能/流程优化 |
| 系统集成 | Integrated, Connected, Unified, Consolidated | 系统对接 |
| 问题解决 | Resolved, Fixed, Addressed, Remediated | Bug 修复 |
| 推进跟进 | Followed up on, Coordinated, Facilitated | 长期项目推进 |

## 重要程度排序

1. **产品发布** - 有明确版本号的发布
2. **量化成果** - 有具体指标的工作
3. **技术创新** - 新技术引入、架构改进
4. **流程优化** - 效率提升
5. **日常维护** - 常规性工作

## 常见量化指标

| 类型 | 示例 |
|------|------|
| 可靠性 | 99.9% uptime, 99.03% compliance |
| 效率 | Reduced time by 50%, 3x faster |
| 采用率 | 90%+ adoption, 200% user growth |
| 质量 | < 0.1% error rate, 85% test coverage |
